events.title: Grey Havens created
events.description: Foundation of the Grey Havens, and of Lindon

events.title: Edain reach Númenor
events.description: The Edain, and a few Drúedain, reach Númenor

events.title: Elros becomes first King
events.description: Elros becomes the first King of Númenor as "Tar-Minyatur"

events.title: Dwarves to Khazad-dûm
events.description: About this time, many Dwarves (presumably Firebeards and Broadbeams) leave their old cities in the Blue Mountains to go to Khazad-dûm, swelling its numbers

events.title: Nólimon
events.description: Birth of Vardamir Nólimon, eldest son and child of Elros Tar-Minyatur.

events.title: Emigration ends
events.description: After this time, the emigration of the Edain to Númenor ends

events.title: Amandil
events.description: Birth of Amandil, eldest son and child of Vardamir Nólimon and third King of Númenor.

events.title: Vardilmë
events.description: Birth of Vardilmë, second child - and only daughter - of Vardamir Nólimon

events.title: Aulendil
events.description: Birth of Aulendil, second son - and third child - of Vardamir Nólimon.

events.title: Nolondil
events.description: Birth of Nolondil, third son - and fourth, and last, child - of Vardamir Nólimon

events.title: Elendil
events.description: Birth of Elendil, fourth King of Númenor and eldest son and child of Tar-Amandil.

events.title: Eärendur
events.description: Birth of Eärendur, second son and child of Tar-Amandil

events.title: Yávien
events.description: Birth of Yávien, eldest child and only daughter of Nolondil

events.title: Mairen
events.description: Birth of Mairen, youngest child and only daughter of Tar-Amandil

events.title: Oromendil
events.description: Birth of Oromendil, eldest son and second child of Nolondil

events.title: Axantur
events.description: Birth of Axantur, second son and third - and last - child of Nolondil

events.title: Elros
events.description: Death of King Elros Tar-Minyatur of Númenor

events.title: Vardamir becomes King
events.description: Elros's eldest son, Vardamir Nólimon, becomes the second King of Númenor but immediately abdicates in favour of his son

events.title: Tar-Amandil becomes King
events.description: Vardamir's son, Tar-Amandil, becomes the third King of Númenor

events.title: Vardamir's Kingship ends
events.description: The de jure end of Vardamir Nólimon's rule as King of Númenor

events.title: Vëantur
events.description: Birth of Vëantur

events.title: Vardamir
events.description: Death of Vardamir Nólimon, second King of Númenor

events.title: Sauron returns
events.description: About this time, Sauron begins to stir again in the East of Middle-earth. This evil is soon perceived by the Elves and the remnants of the Edain in Middle-earth, but they remain unaware of the source of the evil

events.title: Caliondo
events.description: Birth of Caliondo, son of Eärendur

events.title: Silmariën
events.description: Birth of Silmariën, eldest child and daughter of Tar-Elendil and ancestor of the Lords of Andúnië

events.title: Isilmë
events.description: Birth of Isilmë, second child and daughter of Tar-Elendil

events.title: Tar-Meneldur
events.description: Birth of Tar-Meneldur, fifth King of Númenor and youngest child and only son of Tar-Elendil

events.title: Lindissë
events.description: Birth of Lindissë, eldest child and oldest daughter of Axantur

events.title: Ardamir
events.description: Birth of Ardamir, second child and elder son of Axantur

events.title: Cemendur
events.description: Birth of Cemendur, younger son and youngest child of Axantur.

events.title: Cemendur
events.description: Tar-Amandil surrenders the Sceptre

events.title: Tar-Elendil
events.description: Amandil's son, Tar-Elendil, becomes the fourth King of Númenor

events.title: Númenóreans enter Middle-earth
events.description: The first ships of the Númenóreans begin to appear on the coasts of Middle-earth: Entulessë, a ship headed by Vëantur, Captain of the King's Ships, arrives in Mithlond where the Númenóreans are welcomed by Gil-galad

events.title: Númenóreans and Eriadors
events.description: A meeting takes place at Tower Hills between the Númenóreans and the Men of Eriador; the two groups recognise their common heritage

events.title: Vëantur to Númenor
events.description: Vëantur, Captain of the King's Ships, returns to Númenor after completing the first Númenórean voyage to Middle-earth

events.title: Tar-Amandil
events.description: Death of Tar-Amandil, third King of Númenor

events.title: Valandil
events.description: Birth of Valandil, son of Silmariën and Elatan and the first Lord of Andúnië

events.title: Malantur
events.description: Birth of Malantur, son of Caliondo and nearest male-line relation to Tar-Aldarion

events.title: Tar-Aldarion
events.description: Birth of Tar-Aldarion, sixth King of Númenor and eldest child and only son of Tar-Meneldur

events.title: Írildë
events.description: Birth of Írildë, daughter of Cemendur

events.title: Hallatan
events.description: Birth of Hallatan, son of Cemendur and father of Hallacar

events.title: Ailinel
events.description: Birth of Ailinel, second child and elder daughter of Tar-Meneldur

events.title: Aldarion to Middle-earth
events.description: Aldarion departs on his first voyage to Middle-earth with his grandfather Vëantur in the ship Númerrámar. When he arrives at Mithlond he visits Middle-earthLindon and Eriador and befriends Círdan and Gil-galad

events.title: Aldarion returns
events.description: Aldarion returns with his grandfather Vëantur from his first voyage to Middle-earth

events.title: Almiel
events.description: Birth of Almiel, youngest daughter and child of Tar-Meneldur

events.title: Aldarion leaves Númenor
events.description: Aldarion leaves Númenor in the ship Númerrámar on his second voyage to Middle-earth

events.title: Aldarion returns to Númenor
events.description: Aldarion returns to Númenor, after three years, from his second voyage to Middle-earth

events.title: Aldarion leaves Númenor
events.description: Aldarion leaves Númenor on his third voyage to Middle-earth. No longer satisfied just to visit Mithlond, Aldarion explores the coasts past the rivers Baranduin, Gwathló and Isen, rounding Andrast to visit the Bay of Belfalas

events.title: Aldarion returns to Númenor
events.description: After four years, Aldarion returns from his third voyage to Middle-earth having explored the coasts from Lindon to the Bay of Belfalas. Aldarion presents gifts from Gil-galad to his father Meneldur

events.title: Tar-Elendil surrenders Sceptre
events.description: Tar-Elendil surrenders the Sceptre

events.title: Tar-Meneldur becomes King
events.description: Elendil's son, Tar-Meneldur, becomes the fifth King of Númenor

events.title: Eregion founded
events.description: Eregion founded by the Noldor.

events.title: Construction of Ost-in-Edhil
events.description: Construction of Ost-in-Edhil begins

events.title: Guild of Venturers
events.description: Aldarion founds the Guild of Venturers

events.title: Tar-Elendil
events.description: Death of Tar-Elendil, fourth King of Númenor

events.title: Erendis
events.description: Birth of Erendis, wife of Aldarion

events.title: Soronto
events.description: Birth of Soronto, son of Ailinel and Orchaldor

events.title: Tar-Meneldur becomes King
events.description: Aldarion declared the King's Heir to Tar-Meneldur at the age of 100

events.title: Aldarion departs
events.description: Aldarion departs on a voyage to Middle-earth - he is gone for seven years

events.title: Aldarion returns
events.description: Aldarion returns from the 7-year voyage to Middle-earth

events.title: Aldarion to Middle-earth
events.description: Aldarion's first departure towards Middle-earth with the ship Palarran

events.title: Aldarion returns
events.description: Aldarion's return from the first Middle-earth voyage with the ship Palarran

events.title: Aldarion to Middle-earth
events.description: Aldarion's departure towards Middle-earth with the seven ships.

events.title: Aldarion returns
events.description: Aldarion's return from Middle-earth after the seven ships voyage

events.title: Aldarion to Middle-earth
events.description: Aldarion's departure towards Middle-earth in the fourteen years voyage

events.title: Nessanië
events.description: Birth of Nessanië, first child and daughter of Hallatan

events.title: Aldarion returns
events.description: Aldarion's return from the fourteen years voyage to Middle-earth

events.title: Aldarion and Erendis to Andúnië
events.description: Aldarion and Erendis sail from Rómenna to Andúnië. Valandil holds a feast in their honour

events.title: Hallacar
events.description: Birth of Hallacar, second child and only son of Hallatan

events.title: Engagement of Aldarion and Erendis
events.description: Engagement of Aldarion and Erendis

events.title: Wedding delays
events.description: After being betrothed for three years, Aldarion and Erendis agree to delay their wedding until after his voyage

events.title: Aldarion to Middle-earth
events.description: Aldarion's first departure for Middle-earth after his engagement with Erendis

events.title: Aldarion returns
events.description: Aldarion's return from Middle-earth after his engagement with but before his marriage to Erendis

events.title: Aldarion weds Erendis
events.description: Aldarion weds Erendis

events.title: Tar-Ancalimë
events.description: Birth of Tar-Ancalimë, daughter of Aldarion and Erendis

events.title: Aldarion to Middle-earth
events.description: Aldarion departs for Middle-earth aboard his ship Hirilondë.

events.title: Ancalimë learns her father
events.description: Ancalimë learns that Aldarion is her father.

events.title: Aldarion returns
events.description: Aldarion returns to Númenor after a five-year voyage aboard his ship Hirilondë

events.title: Aldarion and Erendis separated
events.description: Aldarion and Erendis become separated

events.title: Tar-Meneldur reads letter
events.description: Tar-Meneldur reads a letter from Gil-galad warning him of a new shadow arising in the East. The king resolves to give the Sceptre to his son in the following year

events.title: Tar-Meneldur no longer King
events.description: Tar-Meneldur surrenders the Sceptre.

events.title: Tar-Aldarion becomes King
events.description: Aldarion, son of Tar-Meneldur, becomes King of Númenor.

events.title: Tar-Ancalimë becomes heiress
events.description: Tar-Ancalimë is declared heiress of King Aldarion.

events.title: Caliondo
events.description: Death of Caliondo, son of Eärendur

events.title: Tar-Meneldur
events.description: Death of Tar-Meneldur

events.title: Erendis
events.description: Death of Erendis, who perishes in water at Rómenna

events.title: Tar-Ancalimë weds Hallacar
events.description: Tar-Ancalimë weds Hallacar, son of Hallatan.

events.title: Barad-dûr build
events.description: About this year Sauron, alarmed by the growing power of the Númenóreans, chooses Mordor as a land to make into a stronghold. He begins the building of Barad-dûr

events.title: Tar-Anárion
events.description: Birth of Tar-Anárion, son of Tar-Ancalimë and Hallacar

events.title: Tar-Aldarion surrenders Sceptre
events.description: Aldarion surrenders the Sceptre to his daughter

events.title: Tar-Ancalimë becomes first Queen
events.description: Tar-Ancalimë becomes the first Ruling Queen of Númenor.

events.title: Tar-Aldarion
events.description: Death of Aldarion

events.title: Tar-Ancalimë neglects policies
events.description: From this time onward Tar-Ancalimë neglects all of her father's policies, giving no further aid to Gil-galad in Lindon

events.title: Tar-Súrion
events.description: Birth of Tar-Súrion, third child and first son of Tar-Anárion

events.title: Sauron seduce Eldar
events.description: Sauron endeavours to seduce the Eldar. Gil-galad refuses to treat with him; but the smiths of Eregion are won over. The Númenóreans begin to make permanent havens

events.title: Hallacar
events.description: Death of Hallacar, husband of Tar-Ancalimë

events.title: Tar-Ancalimë surrenders Sceptre
events.description: Tar-Ancalimë surrenders the Sceptre

events.title: Tar-Anárion becomes King
events.description: Tar-Anárion, son of Tar-Ancalimë, becomes King of Númenor

events.title: Tar-Ancalimë
events.description: Death of Tar-Ancalimë

events.title: Tar-Telperiën
events.description: Birth of Tar-Telperiën.

events.title: Galadriel and Celeborn to Lothlórien
events.description: After this time, Galadriel and Celeborn leave Eregion and go to Lothlórien

events.title: Tar-Anárion surrenders Sceptre
events.description: Tar-Anárion surrenders the Sceptre

events.title: Tar-Súrion becomes King
events.description: Tar-Súrion, third child of Tar-Anárion, becomes King of Númenor. His older sisters refused the Sceptre

events.title: Tar-Anárion
events.description: Death of Tar-Anárion

events.title: Tar-Minastir
events.description: Birth of Tar-Minastir, son of Isilmo, the seconds child of Tar-Súrion

events.title: Rings of Power
events.description: About this year the Elven-smiths instructed by Sauron reach the height of their skill. They begin the forging of the Rings of Power.

events.title: Tar-Súrion surrenders Sceptre
events.description: Tar-Súrion surrenders the Sceptre

events.title: Tar-Telperiën
events.description: Tar-Telperiën, daughter of Tar-Súrion, becomes Queen of Númenor

events.title: Tar-Súrion
events.description: Death of Tar-Súrion

events.title: Three Rings are completed
events.description: About this year the Three Rings are completed in Eregion

events.title: The One Ring
events.description: About this year Sauron forges the One Ring in Orodruin. He completes the Barad-dûr. Celebrimbor perceives the designs of Sauron

events.title: Tar-Ciryatan
events.description: Birth of Tar-Ciryatan, son of Tar-Minastir

events.title: War of the Elves and Sauron
events.description: War of the Elves and Sauron begins

events.title: Three Rings hidden
events.description: The Three Rings are hidden

events.title: Sauron invades
events.description: Sauron's forces invade Eriador

events.title: Elrond to Eregion
events.description: Gil-galad sends Elrond to Eregion.

events.title: Gil-galad calls for aid
events.description: Gil-galad calls on Númenor for aid

events.title: Eregion laid waste
events.description: Eregion laid waste

events.title: Celebrimbor
events.description: Death of Celebrimbor

events.title: Moria gates shut
events.description: The gates of Moria are shut

events.title: Elrond creates Imladris
events.description: Elrond retreats with remnant of the Noldor and founds the refuge of Imladris

events.title: Sauron overruns Eriador
events.description: Sauron overruns Eriador

events.title: Tar-Minastir sends navy
events.description: Tar-Minastir sends a great navy from Númenor to Lindon and to the mouth of the Gwathló

events.title: Sauron defeated
events.description: Sauron is defeated at the Battle of the Gwathló and utterly routed

events.title: Sauron escaping to Mordor
events.description: Sauron is driven out of Eriador, narrowly escaping to Mordor with but a bodyguard

events.title: First White Council
events.description: The first White Council is held. It is decided to establish the Elvish stronghold in eastern Eriador at Imladris rather than in Eregion

events.title: Gil-galad gives Vilya to Elrond
events.description: Gil-galad gives Vilya to Elrond

events.title: Westlands have peace
events.description: The Westlands have peace for a long while

events.title: Tar-Telperiën
events.description: Death of Tar-Telperiën

events.title: Tar-Minastir becomes King
events.description: Tar-Minastir, son of Isilmo, second child of Tar-Súrion, becomes King of Númenor

events.title: Tar-Atanamir
events.description: Birth of Tar-Atanamir, son of Tar-Ciryatan

events.title: Númenóreans to Middle-earth
events.description: From about this time onward the Númenóreans begin to establish dominions on the coasts of Middle-earth

events.title: Sauron extends power
events.description: Sauron extends his power eastwards

events.title: The shadow on Númenor
events.description: The shadow falls on Númenor.

events.title: Tar-Minastir surrenders Sceptre
events.description: Tar-Minastir surrenders the Sceptre

events.title: Tar-Ciryatan becomes King
events.description: Tar-Ciryatan, son of Tar-Minastir, becomes King of Númenor.

events.title: Tar-Minastir
events.description: Death of Tar-Minastir.

events.title: Tar-Ancalimon
events.description: Birth of Tar-Ancalimon, son of Tar-Atanamir

events.title: Tar-Ciryatan surrenders Sceptre
events.description: Tar-Ciryatan surrenders the Sceptre

events.title: Tar-Atanamir
events.description: Tar-Atanamir, son of Tar-Ciryatan, becomes King of Númenor

events.title: Tar-Ciryatan
events.description: Death of Tar-Ciryatan

events.title: Tar-Telemmaitë
events.description: Birth of Tar-Telemmaitë, son of Tar-Ancalimon

events.title: Tar-Atanamir
events.description: Death of Tar-Atanamir, who is called the "Unwilling" for he was the first King who refused to lay down his life or surrender the Sceptre before death

events.title: Tar-Ancalimon takes the Sceptre
events.description: Tar-Ancalimon, son of Tar-Atanamir, takes the Sceptre

events.title: Tensions in Númenor
events.description: Tensions in Númenor begin to rise between the Elendili and the Arandili

events.title: Division of Númenóreans
events.description: Rebellion and division of the Númenóreans begins

events.title: The Nine appear
events.description: About this time the Nazgûl or Ringwraiths, slaves of the Nine Rings, first appear

events.title: Tar-Vanimeldë
events.description: Birth of Tar-Vanimeldë, daughter of Tar-Telemmaitë

events.title: Umbar gets fortress
events.description: Umbar is made into a great fortress of Númenor

events.title: Herucalmo
events.description: Birth of Herucalmo, who would later marry Tar-Vanimeldë and, upon her death, take the Sceptre as Tar-Anducal.

events.title: Pelargir built
events.description: Pelargir is built. It becomes the chief haven of the Faithful Númenóreans

events.title: Tar-Ancalimon
events.description: Death of Tar-Ancalimon

events.title: Tar-Telemmaitë becomes King
events.description: Tar-Telemmaitë, son of Tar-Ancalimon, becomes King of Númenor.

events.title: Tar-Alcarin
events.description: Birth of Tar-Alcarin, son of Tar-Vanimeldë and Herucalmo

events.title: Tar-Calmacil
events.description: Birth of Tar-Calmacil, son of Tar-Alcarin

events.title: Tar-Telemmaitë
events.description: Death of Tar-Telemmaitë

events.title: Tar-Vanimeldë becomes Queen
events.description: Tar-Vanimeldë becomes Queen of Númenor.

events.title: Tar-Ardamin
events.description: Birth of Tar-Ardamin, first child and son of Tar-Calmacil

events.title: Gimilzagar
events.description: Birth of Gimilzagar, second child and second son of Tar-Calmacil

events.title: Tar-Vanimeldë
events.description: Death of Tar-Vanimeldë, ruling Queen of Númenor. Prince consort Herucalmo usurps the throne, taking the name Tar-Anducal

events.title: Tar-Anducal
events.description: Death of Tar-Anducal

events.title: Tar-Alcarin becomes King
events.description: Tar-Alcarin, son of Tar-Vanimeldë and Tar-Anducal, becomes King of Númenor

events.title: Ar-Adûnakhôr
events.description: Birth of Ar-Adûnakhôr, son of Tar-Ardamin

events.title: Tar-Alcarin
events.description: Death of Tar-Alcarin

events.title: Tar-Calmacil becomes King
events.description: Tar-Calmacil becomes King of Númenor; the King's Men call him Ar-Belzagar.

events.title: Ar-Zimrathôn
events.description: Birth of Ar-Zimrathôn, son of Ar-Adûnakhôr

events.title: Tar-Calmacil
events.description: Death of Tar-Calmacil

events.title: Tar-Ardamin becomes King
events.description: Tar-Ardamin, son of Tar-Calmacil, becomes King of Númenor

events.title: Ar-Sakalthôr
events.description: Birth of Ar-Sakalthôr, son of Ar-Zimrathon

events.title: Tar-Ardamin
events.description: Death of Tar-Ardamin.

events.title: Ar-Adûnakhôr takes Sceptr
events.description: Ar-Adûnakhôr takes the Sceptre, the first to take a title in the Adûnaic tongue.

events.title: Ar-Gimilzôr
events.description: Birth of Ar-Gimilzôr, son of Ar-Sakalthôr

events.title: Ar-Adûnakhôr
events.description: Death of Ar-Adûnakhôr

events.title: Ar-Zimrathôn
events.description: Ar-Zimrathôn, son of Ar-Adûnakhôr, becomes King of Númenor

events.title: Ar-Zimrathôn
events.description: Death of Ar-Zimrathôn

events.title: Ar-Sakalthôr
events.description: Ar-Sakalthôr, son of Ar-Zimrathôn, becomes King of Númenor.

events.title: Inziladûn
events.description: Birth of Inziladûn, who would become Tar-Palantir, the older son of Ar-Gimilzôr and Inzilbêth.

events.title: Gimilkhâd
events.description: Birth of Gimilkhâd, the younger son of Ar-Gimilzôr and Inzilbêth

events.title: Ar-Sakalthôr
events.description: Death of Ar-Sakalthôr

events.title: Ar-Gimilzôr
events.description: Ar-Gimilzôr, son of Ar-Sakalthôr, becomes King of Númenor

events.title: Tar-Míriel
events.description: Birth of Tar-Míriel, daughter of Tar-Palantir

events.title: Ar-Pharazôn
events.description: Birth of Ar-Pharazôn, son of Gimilkhâd, the younger son of Ar-Gimilzôr

events.title: Elendil
events.description: Birth of Elendil, son of Amandil

events.title: Repentance of Tar-Palantir
events.description: Repentance of Tar-Palantir.

events.title: Civil war in Númenor
events.description: Civil war in Númenor

events.title: Ar-Gimilzôr
events.description: Death of Ar-Gimilzôr

events.title: Tar-Palantir becomes King
events.description: Tar-Palantir, elder son of Ar-Gimilzôr, becomes King of Númenor

events.title: Isildur
events.description: Birth of Isildur, first son of Elendil

events.title: Anárion
events.description: Birth of Anárion, second son of Elendil

events.title: Gimilkhâd
events.description: Death of Gimilkhâd

events.title: Tar-Palantir
events.description: Death of Tar-Palantir

events.title: Ar-Pharazôn weds Míriel
events.description: Ar-Pharazôn takes Tar-Palantir's daughter, Míriel, to wife against her will

events.title: Ar-Pharazôn takes Sceptre
events.description: Ar-Pharazôn the Golden seizes the Sceptre of Númenor

events.title: Ar-Pharazôn to Umbar
events.description: Ar-Pharazôn sets sail and lands at Umbar

events.title: Sauron to Númenor
events.description: Sauron is taken as prisoner to Númenor.

events.title: Sauron seduces King
events.description: Sauron seduces the King and corrupts the Númenóreans

events.title: Elendur
events.description: Birth of Elendur, the eldest son of Isildur, in Númenor

events.title: Great Armament built
events.description: Ar-Pharazôn begins the building of the Great Armament

events.title: Amandil to Aman
events.description: Amandil, Lord of Andúnië, breaks the Ban of the Valar by sailing to Aman to plead for the Valar's help.

events.title: Meneldil
events.description: Birth of Meneldil, the son of Anárion, the last man born in Númenor

events.title: Ar-Pharazôn assails Valinor
events.description: Ar-Pharazôn assails Valinor

events.title: Ar-Pharazôn and Tar-Míriel
events.description: Deaths of Ar-Pharazôn and Tar-Míriel.

events.title: Downfall of Númenor
events.description: Downfall of Númenor, Elendil and his sons escape

events.title: Arnor and Gondor founded
events.description: The Realms in Exile, Arnor and Gondor, are founded

events.title: Palantíri divided
events.description: The Palantíri are divided

events.title: Sauron to Mordor
events.description: Sauron returns to Mordor

events.title: Aratan
events.description: Birth of Aratan, the second son of Isildur

events.title: Ciryon
events.description: Birth of Ciryon, the third son of Isildur

events.title: Cemendur
events.description: Birth of Cemendur, son of Meneldil

events.title: Sauron attacks Gondor
events.description: Sauron attacks Gondor, takes Minas Ithil and burns the White Tree

events.title: Isildur escapes
events.description: Isildur escapes down Anduin and goes to Elendil in the North, bearing a seedling of the White Tree

events.title: Anárion defends cities
events.description: Anárion defends Minas Anor and Osgiliath

events.title: The Last Alliance
events.description: The Last Alliance of Elves and Men is formed.

events.title: Valandil
events.description: Birth of Valandil, fourth son of Isildur, in Imladris

events.title: Gil-galad and Elendil to Imladris
events.description: Gil-galad and Elendil march east to Imladris

events.title: Last Alliance crosses Misty Mountains
events.description: The host of the Last Alliance of Elves and Men crosses the Misty Mountains

events.title: Battle of Dagorlad
events.description: Battle of Dagorlad and defeat of Sauron

events.title: Siege of Barad-dûr
events.description: Siege of Barad-dûr begins

events.title: Anárion
events.description: Anárion slain

events.title: Sauron
events.description: Sauron overthrown by Elendil and Gil-galad, who perish

events.title: Isildur takes the One Ring
events.description: Isildur takes the One Ring

events.title: Sauron in the shadows
events.description: Sauron passes away and the Ringwraiths go into the shadows

events.title: Second Age ends
events.description: The Second Age ends
